00010         class Localization
00011         {
00016                 public static $languages = array('it', 'en', 'es', 'fr', 'de', 'ja', 'da', 'ru', 'pt', 'pl', 'cs', 'nl', 'fi', 'sv', 'el', 'ro', 'nb', 'hu', 'hr', 'ko');

00022                 private static $strings_table;
00023         
00029                 public static function localize($term)
00030                 {
00031                         if (!self::$strings_table)
00032                         {
00033                                 self::load_strings_table();
00034                         }
00035                         return self::wrap((array_key_exists($term, self::$strings_table)) ?
00036                                 self::$strings_table[$term] : $term);
00037                 }
00038 
00045                 public static function add_strings_table($controller)
00046                 {
00047                         $table = self::$strings_table;
00048                 
00049                         $local_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'], $controller);
00050                         $table = array_merge(self::$strings_table, eval("return {$local_strings};"));
00051                 
00052                         self::$strings_table = $table;
00053                 }
00054                 
00060                 private static function wrap($term)
00061                 {
00062                         if (!LOCALIZATION_DEBUG) return $term;
00063                         //return span($term, array('class' => 'localization-debug'));
00064                         return '{L::' . $term . '::L}';
00065                 }
00066         
00073                 private static function load_strings_file($lang = 'en', $controller = NULL)
00074                 {
00075                         $strings_file = $controller ?
00076                                 dirname(__FILE__) . "/../assets/strings/$controller/localizable-$lang.strings" :
00077                                 dirname(__FILE__) . "/../assets/strings/localizable-$lang.strings";
00078                         
00079                         //print_r($strings_file);
00080                 
00081                         if (file_exists($strings_file))
00082                         {
00083                                 return file_get_contents($strings_file);
00084                         }
00085                         else if ($lang != 'en')
00086                         {
00087                                 return self::load_strings_file('en', $controller);
00088                         }
00089                         return "array();";
00090                 }
00091 
00097                 private static function load_strings_table()
00098                 {
00099                         $table = array();
00100                 
00101                         $controller = $_REQUEST['controller'];
00102                 
00103                         $global_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'] /* GLOBAL */);
00104                         $table = array_merge($table, eval("return {$global_strings}"));
00105                         $local_strings = self::load_strings_file(@$_COOKIE['hl'], $controller);
00106                         $table = array_merge($table, eval("return {$local_strings}"));
00107                 
00108                         self::$strings_table = $table;
00109                 }
00110         }
